data.title: Greek Name Day: Aaron, Abraham, Adam, Danae, Debora, Esthir, Eve, Isaac, Melhisedeh, Noah, Rachel, Rebecca, Ruben, Spiridon (and variants)
data.meta_description: Greek Name DayÂ are often named after a Christian saint or martyr and are mainly celebrated in Catholic and Eastern Orthodox countries. On this day, the holy
data.text:
Greek Name Day are often named after a Christian saint or martyr and are mainly celebrated in Catholic and Eastern Orthodox countries. On this day, the holy person is celebrated, as well as anyone named after this person. Often, these celebrations are more important than birthdays. Celebrated today are:

Aaron

Abraham

Adam

Danae, Danai, Dan

Debora

Esthir, Estir, Esther, Ester

Eve, Eva

Isaac

Melhisedeh, Melchizedek

Noah, Noe

Rachel, Rachael, Raheel

Rebecca, Becca, Becka, Beckah, Beckee, Becker, Beckey, Becki, Beckie, Becky, Beki, Bekka, Reba, Rebakah, Rebba, Rebbecca, Rebbie, Rebeca, Rebeccah, Rebeccea, Rebeccka, Rebecha, Rebecka, Rebeckah

Ruben, Roubini, Rueben, Ruby, Roubina

Spiridon, Spiros, Spyridon, Spyros, Spyridoula
